SEARCH
Package com.software.fitness_system.AdminPageNavigation

Class CoSubscriptionManagementPage

java.lang.Object
com.software.fitness_system.AdminPageNavigation.CoSubscriptionManagementPage
public class CoSubscriptionManagementPage extends Object
Represents the Co-Subscription Management page for the admin in the fitness system. This page allows the admin to manage subscription plans, modify or remove them, and handle subscription details for both clients and instructors. It also provides the ability to view subscription details and navigate back to the main menu.
Author:
Muath Hassoun

  • Method Details

    • addSubscriptionPlan

      public static boolean addSubscriptionPlan()
      Adds a new subscription plan by collecting details from the user through the console.
      Returns:
      true if the subscription plan is added successfully; false otherwise.

    • editSubscriptionPlan

      public static boolean editSubscriptionPlan()
      Allows the user to edit an existing subscription plan by selecting a plan and modifying its properties. Users can edit the price, duration, and description of a plan.
      Returns:
      true if the plan is updated successfully; false otherwise.

    • removeSubscriptionPlan

      public static boolean removeSubscriptionPlan()
      Removes an existing subscription plan by its name.
      Returns:
      true if the subscription plan was removed successfully; false otherwise.

    • printUsersWithThisPlanType

      public static boolean printUsersWithThisPlanType(CustomPlan planType)
      Prints the list of users (clients or instructors) who have the specified subscription plan.
      Parameters:
      planType - The subscription plan type to filter users by.
      Returns:
      True if users with the specified plan are found; false otherwise.

    • selectUserToUpdateHisSubscriptionPlan

      public static boolean selectUserToUpdateHisSubscriptionPlan()
      Prompts the user to select a specific user (client or instructor) to update their subscription plan.
      Returns:
      True if the user is found; false otherwise.

    • giveTheUserNewSubscriptionOpportunity

      public static <T extends User> void giveTheUserNewSubscriptionOpportunity(SubscriptionPlan subscriptionPlan, T user)
      Provides the user with a free subscription trial based on the subscription plan.
      Type Parameters:
      T - A type parameter extending User.
      Parameters:
      subscriptionPlan - The SubscriptionPlan object associated with the user.
      user - The user receiving the free trial.
